nodes.text: The Emperor's Pawns was an article appearing in Star Wars Gamer 5, written by Abel G. Peña and Juan Schwartz with Pablo Hidalgo, and illustrated by Joe Corroney.
The article provided background information on minor characters that surrounded Emperor Palpatine, such as Sarcev Quest and Jeng Droga. It was Peña's first published Star Wars article.
A number of adventure seeds were included with the article that contained elements that have worked their way into Legends since the original release by Abel G. Peña:
The name of the endnotes article on StarWars.com, "Blackhole and Revelations," is a play on the name of the 2006 album Black Holes And Revelations by the English rock band Muse.
